concept.title: Testing an LDAP connection
concept.shortdesc: You can test an LDAP connection either by using the or by using the imaserver test LDAP command on the command-line.

conbody.p: This function validates your configuration by using the URL of the LDAP server and optionally the certificate values, BindDN and BindPassword values, to connect to the LDAP server.
